data.title: This place is SLOWWWwww
data.meta_description:
I am on 22mbs internet connection. 
The forum always loads really SLOW. 
No other issues with the rest of the sites, just here. 
Just a heads up is all… 
Thanks 
Bill

data.text:
I am on 22mbs internet connection.

The forum always loads really SLOW.

No other issues with the rest of the sites, just here.

Just a heads up is all…

Thanks

Bill

offtopic mailing list

email@hidden

Update your subscriptions at:

http://freewaytalk.net/person/options

Could you please try loading this URL? http://freewaypro.com/counter2

I have a theory here, and if you can see this page load quickly, then

I’ll have to move on to a different theory. But if this page stalls

for you as well, I will have confirmation of my theory and we can

proceed to fix it for you.

Walter

On Aug 15, 2010, at 10:44 PM, Bad_i_BILL wrote:

Safari 5

offtopic mailing list

email@hidden

Update your subscriptions at:

http://freewaytalk.net/person/options

offtopic mailing list

email@hidden

Update your subscriptions at:

http://freewaytalk.net/person/options

And still, very slow on http://freewaytalk.net ? Does it change by

what page you are browsing? Did you check the “remember me” option

when you logged in (and are you logged in while you are seeing this

stall)?

I’d like to narrow this down, because what you describe is completely

not what I see here or Dan sees.

Can you see this script, and does it load quickly? http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/prototype/1.6/prototype.js

Walter

On Aug 15, 2010, at 10:59 PM, Bad_i_BILL wrote:

Very Fast on that page.

offtopic mailing list

email@hidden

Update your subscriptions at:

http://freewaytalk.net/person/options

The next time it stalls, see if you can see FreeCounter. If not, then

that’s the problem. I’m going to have to carve out a couple of days

and migrate FreeCounter (and all my other sites still on TextDrive’s

creaky old Alberni) to a Joyent Smart Machine. Those stay running for

years at a time, and don’t suffer the sorts of problems born of “Other

People’s Sites on a shared server” that Alberni does.

Walter

On Aug 16, 2010, at 2:43 PM, Bad_i_BILL wrote:

It “WAS” slow.

From the main page clicking on a topic like Off Topic, it was slow.

Coming in now it was quite fast.
